title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SOL Falls 8.8% as Nearly All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Avalanche (AVAX) joined Solana (SOL) as an underperformer, declining 5.7%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3809.52, down 4.3% (-172.06) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

One of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: ETC (+2.1%) and ETH (-1.4%).

Laggards: SOL (-8.8%) and AVAX (-5.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that nearly all assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading lower, with the overall index down 4.3% and specific cryptocurrencies like SOL and AVAX experiencing significant declines.
